mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD ( IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , COUNT , WRITER , INDATE ) VALUES ( default , #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{count, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NOW() )

INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY ( IDX , SEQ , REPLY , WRITER , INDATE ) VALUES ( #{idx, jdbcType=INTEGER} , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(X.SEQ)+1,1) FROM TBL_REPLY X WHERE X.IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=INTEGER}) , #{reply, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , A.CONTENTS as contents , COALESCE(A.COUNT,0) as count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.USER_NAME as writerNm FROM TBL_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_ID WHERE A.IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.IDX as idx, A.TITLE as title, A.CONTENTS as contents, COALESCE(A.COUNT,0) as count, A.WRITER as writer, A.INDATE as indate, B.USER_NAME as writerNm, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_REPLY X WHERE X.IDX=A.IDX ) AS replyCount
FROM TBL_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')) OR A.CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY A.IDX DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totcnt FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE 1=1
AND ( A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')) OR A.CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.SEQ as seq , A.REPLY as reply , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate FROM TBL_REPLY A WHERE 1=1 AND IDX = #{idx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET COUNT=COALESCE(COUNT, 0)+1 WHERE IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_ATTACH WHERE IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ATTACH ( IDX , SEQ , FILENAME , WRITER , INDATE ) VALUES ( #{idx, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(X.SEQ)+1,1) FROM TBL_ATTACH X WHERE X.IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=INTEGER}), #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.SEQ as seq , A.FILENAME as filename , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate FROM TBL_ATTACH A WHERE 1=1 AND A.IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.SEQ = 1 ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC
